name: Plus Minus
description:
Plus-Minus is a game based on magnets where you as the player, have to maneuver around obstacles to reach the end. Use the respective mode on the gun to attract objects or pull get through platforms, or if there are enemies close by, lob objects at them using your magnet gun.

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

Right Click - Change Mode

Left Click - Interact

Ctrl - Crouch

This is my first actual game I put out and hope you enjoy!
